effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 394,492 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 207,499.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Reversion's healing is increased by 10%, and it has a 50% chance to grant 1 additional stack of Temporal Compression.
(4) Set: Temporal Compression increases the healing of your next empower spell by 5% per stack.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of the Midnight Soiree

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Vile Vial of Kaheti Bile

spells.description: Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to cause the vial to maliciously launch itself onto your lowest health ally, healing them for 303,268.

description: The vial shimmers, brought to life by forgotten magics. Its intent, to harm. Its contents, a potent curative.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 51,014 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.
